definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆说她母亲是这种服装的支持者。

sentences.english: Since it is very cold at the top, coverall is required.
sentences.chinese: 由于山顶很冷，连身服装是必须的。

sentences.english: The clothes designer chose several models to try on his newly designed clothes.
sentences.chinese: 服装设计师选了几个模特来试穿他新设计的服装。

sentences.english: The clothes designer chose several models to try on his newly designed clothes.
sentences.chinese: 服装设计师选了几个模特来试穿他新设计的服装。

sentences.english: A girl in Yao minority dress warmly greeting customers.
sentences.chinese: 穿着民族服装的瑶家姑娘，热情地招呼来往市民。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and-One clothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在一加一服装店当店员，负责销售。

sentences.english: Won the "Sama educate award" in the area of garments industry.
sentences.chinese: 获纺织服装领域“桑麻教育奖”。

sentences.english: This morning I went to the shop to change the coat I bought yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨我去服装店调换我昨天在那买的一件衣服。

sentences.english: Tingtzu loincloths are traditional garb for Yami males on Orchid Island.
sentences.chinese: 丁字裤是兰屿雅美男人的传统服装。

sentences.english: The girls prattled about their clothes.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们闲聊着她们的服装。

sentences.english: Wear light colored clothing made of natural materials.
sentences.chinese: 天然材料制成的，穿浅色服装。

sentences.english: She avoids big-ticket clothing items in case they may be counterfeit — as well as anything edible.
sentences.chinese: 她不买高价服装以免碰到假货，还有吃的东西。

sentences.english: The personal clothing of this soldier of the future would be lightweight with a bullet-proof jacket.
sentences.chinese: 未来士兵的服装重量将更轻，并装备防弹背心。

sentences.english: If want to buy expensive clothing words, direct bother. i can go.
sentences.chinese: 如果想买名贵服装的话，直接去就行了。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and -OneClothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在壹加壹服装店当店员，负责销售。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
